meanings.definition: Relating to the study of life beyond Earth.
meanings.sent1: Scientists conducted exobiological research on Mars.
meanings.sent2: The exobiological mission aimed to find signs of life on distant planets.
meanings.sent3: The exobiological conference was out of this world!
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared to exobiological heights as she pondered life on other planets.
meanings.sent5: The exobiological concept fascinated students with its possibilities.

meanings.definition: Involving the search for extraterrestrial life forms.
meanings.sent1: The exobiological team analyzed signals from space for any alien presence.
meanings.sent2: Many movies depict exobiological encounters with intelligent beings.
meanings.sent3: The exobiological enthusiasts eagerly awaited news of alien sightings.
meanings.sent4: His exobiological dreams led him to build a telescope to search for life beyond Earth.
meanings.sent5: The exobiological quest for otherworldly creatures captured the public's imagination.
